column4: god someome please help me. got a new laptop and ubuntu doesnt support my card i guess for wireless. i tried this ndiswrapper installer but it doesnt work. can someone help me out
did you review the wifi documentation ?
how do i find out what drier i would need
linux driver not sure,  windows just check the makers site,  this might also help  https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HardwareSupport
then the wifi card is not recognised obviously , I'm sorry I am not the best person to ask about this stuff
did you check your model in the hardware list and in te forum maybe you'll find some advice therer
for automating tasks ? like av and stuff ?
no more like the windows version of task manager
command line only ,  open a terminal and type crontab -e ,  if you want to run something as root,  use  sudo crontab -e
check in /etc/init.d/  see what the fnames are that are availabe ,  there should be one file for each service
